channel.title: Text colours! i obviously need alot of help!

item.title: Text colours! i obviously need alot of help!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

As far as I know, you can’t change the chatbox text to a different color(save for the PMs).

In the 508+ however, it started using HTML-like code for the colors. So like

<img=1>
<color=#ff00ff>// i believe this is right...

You could however change how the client parses the sendMessage packet, and then change the foreground color.

Read full topic
item.source: Text colours! i obviously need alot of help!

item.title: Text colours! i obviously need alot of help!
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

[quote=“Gizmo1m, post:6, topic:390061”][OFF TOPIC] Wow, That is really old…

if(playerRights == 3) {
sendMessage(“Welcome to @whi@A&T Scape.@whi@”);
sendMessage(“Made by @gre@Alex :D@gre@”);
sendMessage(“Co-Owner is @gre@ADMIN TOM@gre@”);
sendMessage(“You are an @blu@ADMIN!@blu@”);
sendMessage(“Type ::staffzone to visit the @blu@staffzone.@blu@”);
sendMessage(“Type ::master to level everything to 150.”);
sendMessage(“Type ::commands for the @whi@commands.@whi@”);
sendMessage(“Type ::summonslist for info on @blu@Summoning!@blu@”);

[ONTOPIC] To fix the Client Name go into “GUI.JAVA” and Also “RSINTERFACE.JAVA” to Change the name of your “Client” and fix the “Bank” name.[/quote]

Right, i went into GUI.JAVA and changed the name, from what the client is titles at the top, to what i wanted it to be, but it still dosent change it, heres a printscreen…

The bit at the very top saying Nullpkz etc etc, is what i want to change…but if i change GUI.CLASS i find where that written, but i try and change it, save it, but when i try to run the server, there is an error, i cant see it because the window dosent stay up long enough…

EDIT***** Got it.

item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

Hmm, yeah okay then, can you help me get the code for an interface to pop up? But, atm theres already an interface on startup, how do i add text to it?

Thanks

Also* Can i ask how you change the name of the client title. When i run the client i play my server on, at the top it says there server name, i just wondered if it is possible to change that, and how i would go about it…

item.title: Text colours! i obviously need alot of help!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

I don’t think colours apply to the sendMessage method. Someone correct me if I’m wrong.

As alternative, you can make an interface appear when logged in and have colours on that.

Read full topic

item.title: Text colours! i obviously need alot of help!
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

Right, so i am finishing/edditing some code for my server, and i want to know how to get the different colours to come up, in the chat box for other players, asin have The Owner is Alex etc…

Here is the piece of code i am working on:

if(playerRights == 3) {
sendMessage(“Welcome to @whi@A&T Scape.@whi@”);
sendMessage(“Made by @gre@Alex :D@gre@”);
sendMessage(“Co-Owner is @gre@ADMIN TOM@gre@”);
sendMessage(“You are an @blu@ADMIN!@blu@”);
sendMessage(“Type ::staffzone to visit the @blu@staffzone.@blu@”);
sendMessage(“Type ::master to level everything to 150.”);
sendMessage(“Type ::commands for the @whi@commands.@whi@”);
sendMessage(“Type ::summonslist for info on @blu@Summoning!@blu@”);

As you can see, i am trying to change some colours of text in the chat lobby when the player loggs in. ( i know only admins or players with ‘3’ rights can see this, but i can copy the copy for other players/mods too.) I need some help

Thanks in advance
CoreVersion.

Read full topic
